title: Large-Scale Blended Learning Program for Ethnic Minority Dance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dance theory and intermediate-level practical dance experience
context.additional_context: Project-based curriculum for in-service professionals aimed at strengthening cultural identity

learning_goals: Learners can explain and analyze the historical and cultural backgrounds of minority ethnic traditional dance techniques.
Learners can reconstruct minority ethnic dance works through online and offline activities in a blended learning environment.
Learners can produce and present dance creations reflecting cultural identity through project-based assessment.

resources: Digital library of ethnic minority dance resources
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
